|brand = Creator |model = Ci40 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (Marduk) |revision = (02KZ/5+) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2017/02/08 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/creator/creator_ci40_marduk_02kz_5 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = IoT, development board, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Imagination;cXT200;interAptiv (Pistachio); |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 550 <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD5F4GQ4UCYIGT; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q16DVSNIG; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646Q-BYK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = yes |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ8091; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:19:F5 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.10;v1.0.4; |stockos = Linux;4.4.7;OpenWrt;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (OTG) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console,, USB Female Micro-B |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, CN15,, EJTAG,, 14-pin header,, CN1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.1, 6LoWPAN, mikroBUS, Audio in/out (3.5mm), SPDIF, TPM |addchip = 96kHz 24-bit ADC;AKM;AK5720;;1;,,, USB to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT230X;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module;Infineon;SLB9615;;1;,,, 5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Skyworks;SKY85806-11;2;,,, Bluetooth 4.2 Single-Chip Radio & Baseband IC;CSR;CSR8811;;1;,,, 6LoWPAN (IEEE 802.15.4) Transceiver Modem;Cascoda;CA-8210;;1;,,, Dual UART w/ I2C-bus/SPI Interface IrDA support;NXP;SC16IS752;;1;,,, 105mW Dual Audio Power Amplifier;Etek Microelectronics;ETK4812;;1;,,, 5A, 18V, 650kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;RIchtek;RT6206A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2016 |estprice = 53 |upc = 759454829131 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = UK
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Imagination;C4500; |rad1chip2 = Imagination;iE1000; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Stylized Creator logo and 'Ci40' are on top of board. {{See also|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Imagination]] ''Technologies'' cXT200 @550MHz :Dual-Core (2C/2T) [[MIPS]] ''interAptiv'' (''Pistachio'') *Storage: 512MB (NAND), 2MB (SPI NOR) Flash, :TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 256MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet (100M) port *Wi-Fi: [[Imagination]] ''Technologies'' C4500/iE1000 :802.11abgn/ac (2T2R) â€¢ ''Ensigma'' Explorer RPU *Other Wireless: [[CSR]] CSR8811 - Bluetooth 4.2, :''Cascoda'' CA-8210 - 6LoWPAN (802.15.4) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (micro-B) (OTG/Power) port *Expansion: 2x mikroBUS headers, 1x 40-pin :(RaspberryPi B+ compatible) header *Power Source: 9V/1A via barrel :or 5V/2A via USB micro-B
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imagination_Creator#Creator_Ci40 ''Creator Ci40'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/creator/ci40_marduk_02kz_5 ''Creator Ci40 (Marduk) 02KZ/5+'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/11/23/mips-creator-ci40-development-board-powered-by-cxt200-soc-launched-for-53-on-kickstarter/ ''MIPS Creator Ci40 Development Board'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/creator-ci40-sbc-runs-openwrt-debian-brillo-on-dual-core-mips/ ''Creator Ci40 SBC runs OpenWRT, Debian, Brillo'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://liliputing.com/mips-creator-ci40-is-a-dev-board-for-iot-projects/ ''MIPS Creator Ci40 is a dev board for IoT'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://www.elektormagazine.com/review/review-creator-ci40-iot-kit ''Review: Creator Ci40 IoT Kit'' on '''elektor|Mag''']
